Exclusive: China removes official after video games rules spark turmoil -sourcesChina removed an official at a government body overseeing its press and publications regulator, five sources who were briefed on the matter said, days after Chinese gaming stocks were hit by proposed rules to curb spending on video games. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 13:27:31 GMT GH2FTJH625JIPFNKNXPVHJY4XY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-removes-official-after-video-games-rules-spark-turmoil-sources-2024-01-02/Josh Ye世界中国
Morning Bid: S&P 500 record in view as 2024 begins in same veinA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Samuel Indyk. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 11:04:31 GMT 6FMXX7SQORNABECVGP4VCZQ3R4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-01-02/Reuters市场美国市场
Global factory activity ended 2023 on a soft noteGlobal factories had a weak finish to 2023, with euro zone activity contracting for an 18th straight month in December and Asia's manufacturing powerhouses taking a hit due to China's patchy economic recovery. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 10:58:37 GMT SGEU4I532BNIHBOZZ5HDYR6NRQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-economy-global-factory-activity-ending-2023-soft-note-2024-01-02/Indradip Ghosh, Sam Holmes市场宏观问题
China's state-owned developers dominate sales, land markets in 2023 - surveysChina's property market continued to consolidate in 2023 with state-affiliated firms dominating the home sales and land acquisition market, private surveys showed, as more private firms got embroiled in the sector's deepening debt crisis. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 09:20:30 GMT P42PDE6GQNN7XD4TWWYZME4LG4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-state-owned-developers-dominate-sales-land-markets-2023-surveys-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中国
ASML shares dip after Netherlands pulls licence for some China exportsComputer chip equipment maker ASML said the Dutch government had partially revoked an export licence for the shipment of some of its machines to China, prompting a dip in shares and criticism from Beijing on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 09:13:26 GMT QQYWIT4YR5JVHFMFA37W5NPD54 https://www.reuters.com/technology/asml-shares-dip-after-netherlands-revokes-licence-some-china-exports-2024-01-02/Reuters技术
China's home sales during New Year holiday fall 26% compared with 2023China's average daily home sales during the three-day New Year holiday in 40 cities, based on floor area, fell 26% compared with the same period last year, a survey showed on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 08:11:14 GMT 27235CXPM5K5XG5JDEF3伊特里伊https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-home-sales-during-new-year-holiday-fall-26-compared-with-2023-2024-01-02/Reuters市场宏观问题
Disputes over China ties sour Taiwan election campaignBitter disputes on how to handle relations with China and avoid conflict are dominating the final stretch of election campaigning in Taiwan, as some polls show a tight race between the main two contenders to be the island's next president. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 06:46:33 GMT WXNDKD7MFVINPMIBZXUEV5I7FQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/disputes-over-china-ties-sour-taiwan-election-campaign-2024-01-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Thailand, China to waive visas for each other's citizens from MarchThailand and China will permanently waive visa requirements for each other's citizens from March, Thai Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin said on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 04:16:02 GMT CNCHISFHI5P5FNY5PPDSFFGVYI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thailand-china-permanently-waive-visas-each-others-citizens-march-thai-pm-2024-01-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Hong Kong tycoon Lai pleads not guilty in national security trialHong Kong tycoon and pro-democracy advocate Jimmy Lai pleaded not guilty on Tuesday in a landmark trial, where he is accused of endangering China's national security, as prosecutors laid out details of what they said was collusion with foreign forces. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 03:52:36 GMT B2HKYXPKQRKVXIYWEEQ5LTZE4U https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/hong-kong-tycoon-jimmy-lai-pleads-not-guilty-national-security-Trial-2024-01-02/Jessie Pang, Dorothy Kam世界亚太地区
China calls on Taiwan's people to promote 'peaceful reunification'The head of China's Taiwan Affairs Office on Tuesday called on Taiwan's people to promote the process of "peaceful reunification", saying it was the common desire of people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 03:25:47 GMT G5RJI3MSHJLIXGHF52TZVBONRM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-calls-taiwans-people-promote-peaceful-reunification-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中国
Asia's factories end 2023 on soft note amid fragile China recoveryAsia's factory activity weakened in December, portending a shaky start for the region's manufacturing powerhouses in 2024 as China's patchy economic recovery impeded a broader revival in demand.
